gt_text: 秋日咖啡节 轻啜、细品、慢生活。 秋季限定风味现已上市。 南瓜香料回归 专为毛衣季调配
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Chinese title "秋日咖啡节"
*   Steaming coffee cup
*   Wooden table
*   Fallen leaves (on table, surrounding cup)
*   Cinnamon sticks
*   Cozy scarf
*   Book
*   Autumn park background
*   Softly falling leaves (in background)
*   Small yellow tagline "轻啜、细品、慢生活。"
*   Cream-colored label (below title)
*   Text "秋季限定风味现已上市。" (on cream-colored label)
*   Coffee brand logo
*   Text "南瓜香料回归"
*   Text "专为毛衣季调配"
*   QR code for online ordering
